resources.string:
Hi my name is Wayne 

I love Android 

I play football for Starcross Dons, formally HT Dons, formally Landon FC 

I drive a BMW 320d, in mineral grey 

I live at 49 Second Avenue, Dawlish 

I have a wife called Kirsten and a daughter called Poppy, we also have a kitten named Boo, a guinea pig called Buddy, a rabbit called Isla and 2 turtles called Charlie & Lola
